title: Spooky Poro Pumpkin

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: My girlfriend was making her first jack 'o lantern in years, so she decided to make it the underworld poro. So since her league account is too new, I decided to post it for her. ^^

replies.body:
I'd say this is a pretty awesome job if she's a bit rusty when it comes to carving pumpkins! You can't go wrong with poros... ever. :3 What's her summoner name? Would you guys wanna play a game sometime? ^-^

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Yeah, of course! We'll add you tonight.
